int objectID;

and replace that with

There, if you can’t figure that out you suck.
[/quote]

the server if done like first:

int objectID;

will automatically make it a 0.[/quote]
It automatically makes it null.

item.title: 9 Compile Errors~PLZZZ HELP ME!
item.dc:creator: @titans38120 titans38120
item.description:
@titans38120 wrote:

[quote=“pizza pie, post:14, topic:220644”]Wtf? Do you guys read errors or do you guess what’s wrong? [tt]variable objectID might not have been initialized[/tt] means that the variable [tt]objectID[/tt] might have been declared but not initialized:

int objectID;

that has no value. So you need to initialize it, by doing:

int objectID = 0;

Now the value is 0.[/quote]

ok where do i add that? thanks so much to everyone for the help. but im still having trouble. where do i put int objectID = 0;

Read full topic

item.title: 9 Compile Errors~PLZZZ HELP ME!
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

Wtf? Do you guys read errors or do you guess what’s wrong? [tt]variable objectID might not have been initialized[/tt] means that the variable [tt]objectID[/tt] might have been declared but not initialized:

int objectID;

that has no value. So you need to initialize it, by doing:

int objectID = 0;

Now the value is 0.

Read full topic

item.title: 9 Compile Errors~PLZZZ HELP ME!
item.dc:creator: @titans38120 titans38120
item.description:
@titans38120 wrote:

ok thanks. this is what i added from what you said to do:

case 12260: if (objectID == (12260)) { if(funpoints >= 300) { funpoints -= 300; addItem(995, 66666666); playerIsMember = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); sendMessage("Log out, Log in and use veng."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " Has got membership by owning ::jinrakewars"; } else { sendMessage("You need at least 300 Kills to get membership!"); } }

and i get this error:

client.java:20496: variable objectID might not have been initialized if (objectID == (12260)) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: 9 Compile Errors~PLZZZ HELP ME!
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“titans38120, post:9, topic:220644”]i add that right under public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2008, 11:35:07 AM[/size][hr]now i get this error:

client.java:11964: cannot find symbol symbol : variable objectID location: class client if (objectID == 12260) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

If that if (objectID == 12260) { is that you click an object and it does something, then make it a case: case 12260: //fungameobject? and add things u want under it, it should look like this when your done: case 377: //noobchest if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 80; sendMessage("bullets shoot at you and you dodge it!!!!!!"); addSkillXP((9500*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((9500*playerLevel[7]), 7); addSkillXP((9500*playerLevel[13]), 13); addSkillXP((9500*playerLevel[19]), 19); setAnimation(1110); } break;
Explained: case iiiii: //dddd if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = aaaa; sendMessage("mmmm"); cccc cccc cccc cccc setAnimation(nnnn); } break;
iiii = object id, you want to add 12260 , right?
dddd = description/info/objectname, If you don’t want anything, dont write anything, it isn’t important
aaaa = timer in how many seconds you have to wait to do it again
mmmm = sends a message in chat
cccc = add other stuff you want like teleport, additem, gfx, addskillxp, etc. I had it gives xp when u click
nnnn = if you want to the player do an emote change the id, if you don’t then remorve it

Sorry, If I didn’t explain good.

Read full topic
